channel.title: ---([How Do I Make That Shops Buy Items I Added--)]
channel.description:
i added a armadyl, zamorak,saradomi and more silab items, but when i buy em from the shop i can't sell them back in any shops?...
on those shops it says ---Sell----Buy-- i did them to 1-1 on all shops... And on item.cfg i added this
item = 15335 Saradomin Godsword This is a Saradomi Gs 500000000 500000000 500000000 89 66 52 -21 77 40 58 100 39 120 12 30
Source: Project Czar... any1 if theres a tutorial how to make shops buy back silab items, post the link if not could u plz help me?
